item.description:
Confidence in Action: A 5 Week Tele-Seminar Assertiveness Training for Nice Guys


♦ Do you find it challenging to balance staying true to yourself and accommodating those you care
about?
♦ Do you often do things you donâ€™t really want to out of fear, obligation or hope of getting something in
return, and resent it afterwards?
♦ Do you find it hard to speak up for yourself, ask for what you want and hold your ground?

This 5 Week Tele Seminar will provide you with concrete techniques, exercises and action steps to boost your confidence and assertiveness in a balanced and healthy way.

Brynn Bishop, Tantra Educator, Empowerment and Pleasure Coach, brings you a synthesis of some of the most effective tools and techniques out there.

In this course you will:

♦ Discover how staying in integrity with yourself can bring you closer to others
♦ Gain insight into relationship dynamics
♦ Learn a powerful communication model
♦ Learn a series of concrete techniques and practices to boost your confidence and have you take
action
♦ Receive weekly exercises, check ins and individualized guidance
♦ Have access to download audio recordings of all sessions and guided exercises

Benefits you will walk away with:

♦ Greater confidence
♦ Increased self-awareness and self-care
♦ Increased ability to appropriately assert your needs and desires
♦ More resiliency
♦ Greater understanding of dynamics and choices
♦ More effective communication skills
♦ Increased integrity

Mondays, 7-8:30pm, Oct 25, Nov 1, 8, 15, 22
Listen live and/or download the recordings
$115 if paid by Oct 23, $140 thereafter

RSVP for all 5 sessions.

Brynn Bishop is a Tantra Educator and Empowerment and Pleasure Coach with over twenty five years experience in the fields of body-mind integration and conscious relating. Brynn guides individuals and couples in clearing emotional blocks, and awakening and harnessing their Vital Energy to experience the fullest range of Pleasure in their sexuality, Intimacy in their relationships, and Purpose and Passion in their lives.

For a free phone consultation, if you have any questions, or to arrange alternate payment, please email Brynn Bishop (organizer).
item.name: Confidence in Action: A 5 Week Assertiveness Tele-Seminar for Nice Guys
